prompts: Create a bird-like Pokemon with striking black and white colors, and a vibrant orange beak.
Imagine a flying Pokemon that has a friendly and curious personality, perfect for forest habitats.
Design a Pokemon inspired by a toucan, featuring large wings and a colorful beak.
Generate a small, agile Pokemon that thrives in grasslands and has a playful demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a woodpecker, with distinctive markings and a sleek body shape.
Give me a flying-type Pokemon with a unique color scheme that stands out in urban environments.
Make a Pokemon that can easily navigate mountainous regions, showcasing its strength and agility.
